## SearchManager.searchTrain() method

Search a train by headsign ID

**Signature:**

```typescript
searchTrain(headsign: string, date?: Date): Promise<Vehicle>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

The headsign of the line

</td><td>

Date


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Not required, but highly recommended for effective results


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Vehicle](./sncf.js.vehicle.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example

This example shows how to search a line by name

```javascript
const vehicle = await sncf.searchManager.searchTrain('123456', date)
console.log(vehicle)
```
